document_data.mainbody:
ia Ingelri was a skilled human blacksmith for hire from the city of Neverwinter, active in the late 15 century DR.
By the late 15 century DR, Tia Ingelri was already an experienced blacksmith with many years of experience under her belt. Despite her long career, she remained passionate and driven to tackle more challenging projects, leading her to offer services to the adventurers and defenders of Neverwinter.
